title: Europeans - Vocabulary (1983)
description:
Europeans - Vocabulary (1983)

Wikipedia: "The Europeans were a British New Wave group formed in 1981 and disbanded in 1985. They released three albums, none of which achieved much in terms of chart position. In 1989, their former keyboard player and co-lead vocalist Steve Hogarth joined Marillion as lead vocalist. The Europeans should not be confused with the similarly named Europeans, a Bristol band that were active 1977-1979, who released several recordings on Heartbeat Records and Bristol Archive Records."
